TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A place that gives care to people who have physical or mental disabilities and need help with activities of daily living (such as taking a bath, getting dressed, and going to the bathroom) but do not need to be in the hospital.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "residencia de cuidados de enfermería"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Lugar donde se atiende a las personas con discapacidades físicas o mentales, que no necesitan estar en un hospital, para que realicen las actividades de la vida diaria (como bañarse, vestirse e ir al baño).
